short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alert if web site is down.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alerts when a website is not returning HTTP code 200 OK or completely down.

Only supports: 
https://www.pad2pad.com
https://www.emachineshop.com
https://www.miclog.com
https://taskring.com

Check occurs once every 10 minutes.
